sentences.english: Yangquan is rich in resources, resources.

sentences.english: Yangquan is a city short of water and mainly depends on karst groundwater in the Niangziguan spring region.
sentences.chinese: 娘子关泉域岩溶地下水是山西省阳泉市的主要水源地。

sentences.english: Now. It is installed in Yangquan of Shanxi for testing work.

sentences.english: This paper introduces the equipment refurbishment and operation adjustment of the ash handling system in Yangquan No.

sentences.english: Yangquan mining area has high gas content and gas emission.
sentences.chinese: 阳泉矿区瓦斯含量大，涌出量大。

sentences.english: Yangquan municipal sub-humid warm temperate continental monsoon climate zone.
sentences.chinese: 阳泉市属暧温带半湿润大陆性季风气候区。
